# Config Guardrails

- Do NOT change version/build numbers, bundle identifiers, schemes, or EAS profiles unless explicitly asked.
- Do NOT add/remove packages or upgrade versions unless explicitly asked.
- If you suspect config is the issue, propose the change first and explain impact in 2â€“4 bullets.

Always output the HANDOFF PACKET.
